verses.kjv: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, in the mountain of his holiness.
verses.ct: The LORD is great and deserves the highest praise in the city of our God, on his holy mountain.

verses.kjv: Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, the city of the great King.
verses.ct: Rising beautifully, the delight of the whole earth — that is Mount Zion, on the northern heights, the city of the great King.

verses.kjv: God is known in her palaces for a refuge.
verses.ct: God has made himself known as a fortress within her palaces.

verses.kjv: For, lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.
verses.ct: Look — the kings gathered together and advanced as one.

verses.kjv: They saw it, and so they marvelled; they were troubled, and hasted away.
verses.ct: But when they saw it, they were stunned. They panicked and ran away.

verses.kjv: Fear took hold upon them there, and pain, as of a woman in travail.
verses.ct: Terror gripped them right there, along with agony like a woman in labor.

verses.kjv: Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.
verses.ct: You shatter the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.

verses.kjv: As we have heard, so have we seen in the city of the LORD of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. Selah.
verses.ct: What we had heard about, we have now witnessed with our own eyes in the city of the LORD of hosts, the city of our God — God will keep it secure forever. Selah.

verses.kjv: We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God, in the midst of thy temple.
verses.ct: We have reflected on your faithful love, God, here in the middle of your temple.

verses.kjv: According to thy name, O God, so is thy praise unto the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of righteousness.
verses.ct: Just as your name is known, God, so your praise reaches to the ends of the earth. Your right hand is filled with righteousness.

verses.kjv: Let mount Zion rejoice, let the daughters of Judah be glad, because of thy judgments.
verses.ct: Let Mount Zion celebrate! Let the towns of Judah be glad because of your just decisions.

verses.kjv: Walk about Zion, and go round about her: tell the towers thereof.
verses.ct: Walk all around Zion and circle her completely. Count her towers.

verses.kjv: Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; that ye may tell it to the generation following.
verses.ct: Pay close attention to her walls and examine her palaces, so that you can describe them to the next generation.

verses.kjv: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.
verses.ct: Because this God is our God forever and ever. He will guide us all the way through death.
